title: xMatix Inventory
subtitle: Maintain inventory accuracy at every location

hero.title: xMatix Inventory
hero.description1: Track precisely. Audit continuously. Act early.
hero.description2: xMatix Inventory helps organizations govern inventory execution across locations with real time visibility, standardized processes, and audit ready traceability.

cardsData.title: The problem
cardsData.content: Inventory accuracy suffers when stock movements, audits, and updates are spread across disconnected systems and manual processes.
list: Stock movements are delayed or inconsistent
Physical counts do not match system records

cardsData.title: The xMatix Approach
cardsData.content: xMatix Inventory standardizes how inventory actions are executed, tracked, and reconciled so every movement follows a governed and measurable process.

keyCapabilities.title: Core Capabilities
keyCapabilities.description2: xMatix Inventory modernizes inventory execution without replacing existing ERP or warehouse systems while improving accuracy and control.

cardsData.title: Stock Movement Execution
cardsData.description: Orchestrate transfers, adjustments, reservations, and returns through standardized workflows.

cardsData.title: Inventory Audit Workflows
cardsData.description: Run cycle counts and audits with guided tasks and validations.

cardsData.title: Real Time Availability Tracking
cardsData.description: Maintain accurate stock visibility across locations and channels.

cardsData.title: Exception Detection and Resolution
cardsData.description: Identify variances, shrinkage, and mismatches early and resolve them within governed workflows.

cardsData.title: Cross Module Inventory Alignment
cardsData.description: Synchronize inventory execution with sales, warehouse, procurement, and service modules.

requestADemo.heading: See xMatix Inventory in Action
requestADemo.description: Reduce stock discrepancies, improve fulfillment reliability, and gain confidence in inventory decisions without disrupting existing systems.
